page.title: 15THE OLD HOUSE (cont.)
page.content: Early this century the house was called{Gibbs Old Farmhouse.}It was once a farm in its own right then owned by{Greentrees Farm}and later owned by{Highley Manor}who modernised the house. The name was shortened to the Old House. Now a Sir and Lady, who bought the house over 20 years ago, live there. They used to come from London for weekends and if the central heating had not come on the house was earthy cold as the building has no proper foundations. 20 years ago the {High Street}was a very quiet lane but now is very busy particularly during the rush hour. Fir trees are being planted to help protect the house. In the garden are 2 sheds which were the outside toilets, a manhole which covers the old well, an old marl pond where the clay for the plaster was dug out and a modern swimming pool.
